text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Siiiigh…

One holiday, I went out with Sakura 
Bakushin O, but she didn't seem to be in 
the mood the whole time.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
To tell the truth… a classmate of mine
is leaving the Academy.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry to say goodbye to her, both as 
class president and personally…

Due to the nature of the Academy,
students often transfer out. But that
doesn't mean it's any easier when they
have to part ways.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Oya? 
Could that be…

A student in a jersey was running in
front of me. She seemed to be heading
towards the school.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
It's the classmate I was telling you
about! I can't believe she's training at
this hour――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
As class president, I cannot allow this! 
Stop right theeeere!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
It's late, you should head back.
I cannot let a curfew breaker go
unnoticed!

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Ughh… I know I'm not supposed to be 
doing this. 
But I'm running out of time!!

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
I have to leave the Academy. Because my 
father was transferred overseas――

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
That's why I wanted to practice for my
last race… a mock race, so I wouldn't
have any regrets.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Last race…

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
I never ended up growing, and I never
had a trainer… But I want to finish
everything off with contentment!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I see, I understand your situation. 
And I've made up my mind…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
From this moment on, as class president, 
I will assist you in your training!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: That's okay, right, Trainer!?
choice_data_list:
Yeah, but you'll have to wait for tomorrow, it's curfew 
today.

Yeah, but you'll have to wait for tomorrow, it's curfew 
today.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Uu, that's right! 
Then, special training starts tomorrow!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
With my assistance and Trainer's
guidance, you're sure to win first
place!!

The next day, I decided to hang out with 
Sakura Bakushin O and help her classmate 
train.

When I asked her what kind of mock race 
she was going to run, she replied, "Long 
distance." 
This was a kind of race that Sakura 
Bakushin O wasn't exactly good at.
choice_data_list: So, what kind of practice are you planning on doing?
So, what kind of practice are you planning on doing?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
All you have to do is Bakushin! 
If you Bakushin, you'll find your way!

The response was both unsurprising and 
unfavorable. 
This is――
choice_data_list: Build up your stamina and let's Bakushin!
There's a certain timing to Bakushin-ing.

text_block_list.text:
I told her that endurance and stamina to 
run the course were essential to achieve 
success in long distances.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I see. Well, you certainly can't
Bakushin if you're out of energy!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Understood! 
I shall keep this up to the bitter end!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ha, haah… Looks like… fuuh, that's about 
it… for today!

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Thanks, Baku-chan! 
And your Trainer, too…

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
I think I have a good feeling about
today's training. I'm sure I'll get
good results!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: That's… above all else――

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Baku-chan!? 
……Wait, are you sleeping?

Sakura Bakushin O, a sprinter, must have 
had a tough time training with a 
long-distance runner.

However, for the sake of her classmate,
she pushed herself to her limits and
went along with the training anyways…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Mumblemumble… 
It's only the… natural thing to 
dooo… snoore……

Sakura Bakushin O, still asleep, 
smiled contentedly.

I explained that she could move up in
the rankings by Bakushin-ing at just the
right moment.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I see, so what you're saying is,
Bakushin is a kind of special move!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Now, then, let us find the impeccable
timing for this Bakushin!

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Alright, got it!

Once that was decided, the first thing
to do was to find out what Sakura
Bakushin O's classmate was capable of
and what her running habits were.

I put together a training regimen that
best suited her current situation,
and asked her to implement it into her
routine.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Phew, I guess that's it for today!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Your training has paid off, and you've
got the timing of your Bakushin down to
a tee!

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I've got a good feeling about
this! I'll make sure I get a good
result!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I'm counting on you! 
Bakushin is the solution to everything!

text_block_list.name: Freckled Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Fufu, thanks. 
You're always there for me, Baku-chan.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Of course I am! I'm the president of
your class, after all!

Being thanked by her classmate seems to 
have given Sakura Bakushin O more 
confidence.
